body.h1: WSO2 Complex Event Processor (CEP) Documentation Index
body.p: Installation Guide : Gives basic steps on how to download, install, and run WSO2 CEP using the binary distribution, and how to build WSO2 CEP using the source distribution.

User Guide : A manual on how to run and configure the WSO2 CEP through the management console. The user guide is centered on a familiar and simple example. It walks you through each important step in creating, deploying, and managing a cep bucket through the management console.
Developer Guide : This is a guide for developing WSO2 CEP. If you are new to CEP and willing to contribute, this guide is for you.

How to Run the WSO2 CEP Samples : This document provides you with a set of CEP samples demonstrating various capabilities of the CEP. Each sample provides a comprehensive guide for creating, deploying, and testing the cep bucket presented in the sample.

How to extend the functionality already offered by the CEP : This document provides you a set of extensibility points in the CEP. Each extensibility can be leveraged to enhance the functionality offered by the CEP.
The WSO2 Oxygen Tank Library : The Library contains articles, tutorials, presentations, and other knowledge base items published on The Oxygen Tank.
Wiki Space : This is the working Wiki for WSO2 CEP.
